title: 怎么在‘MOJANG’那个界面打字啊?
author: 忧桑_

replies.author: HEROBRIND
replies.txt_content: 在minecraft.jar里面找到title文件夹，再找到mojang.png然后用画图修改

replies.author: HEROBRIND
replies.txt_content: 寻找图片目录然后用画图修改

replies.author: HEROBRIND
replies.txt_content: 还有你发错版了，应该发到原版问答

replies.author: 忧桑_
replies.txt_content:
PTmissionary 发表于 2013-4-5 12:34 
minecraft.jar/title/mojang.png
改这个图片。
谢谢~!{:10_512:}。。。。。。
